title: Lost one of my champions! And it says I need to purchase it again.
body:
So today was another day for me to go back to playing LOL with my friends, the usual. I would choose either mid or top. HOWEVER, since top was taken I decided to go mid Talon. AND THAT'S WHEN I REALIZE, he's not on my champion select. So I thought maybe it was a glitch, and it would go away after the game. No, when I checked the store it said Talon was not owned by me. So then I checked the purchase history to see if for some reason someone might have hacked my account and returned him. NOPE. Any else having this issue? I really enjoy league and I want to continue enjoying it while it lasts.

P.S I got Talon as a gift from a friend a few months back. (IDK if this has to do with anything)

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it doesn't look like Talon is unlocked on your account.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can offer more context to you individually.  We'll reply back asap!
THX soo much, but yes currently he's apparently not unlocked. But if you see my battle history I have been playing him lately. Just in case you thought I wanted a free champion, but thx anyways!
